title: Malarnthum Malaratha Lyrics Pasamalar
stanzas:
vandhu vidindhum vidiyaatha
kaalai pozhuthaaga
vilaindha kalai annamae.

nadhiyil vilaiyaadi
kodiyil thalai seevi.
nadantha ilam thendralae

valar podhigai malai thondri
madhurai nagar kandu
pozhindha thamizh mandrame](2)

Yaanai padai kondu
saenai pala vendru
aala pirandhaayadaa
puvi aala pirandhaayadaa

aththai magalai manamkondu
ilamai vazhi kandu
vazha pirandhaayadaa
vazha pirandhaayadaa

aththai magalai manamkondu
ilamai vazhi kandu
vazha pirandhaayadaa

thanga kedaiyaaram
vaira maniyaaram
thandhu manam paesuvaar
porul thandhu
manam paesuvaar

maaman thangai magalaana
mangai unakkaaga
ulagai vilai paesuvaar
ulagai vilai paesuvaar

maaman thangai magalaana
mangai unakkaaga
ulagai vilai paesuvaar

nadhiyil vilaiyaadi
kodiyil thalai seevi.
nadantha ilam thendralae

valar podhigai malai thondri
madhurai nagar kandu
pozhindha thamizh mandrame

Siragil enai moodi
arumai magal pola
valartha kathai sollavaa

kanavil ninaiyaatha
kaalam idai vandhu
priththa kadhai sollavaa
priththa kadhai sollavaa

kannin mani pola
maniyin nizhal pola
kalandhu pirandhomada

indha mannum kadal vaanum
maraindhu mudinthaalum
marakka mudiyaathadaa
uravai pirikka mudiyaathadaa
